oai_dc:dc.dc:title: AGTEC-Org Technological Handbook of Methods
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Carcea, Marina
Samson, Marie-Françoise
Abecassis, Joël
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
Technology assessment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A common handbook was conceived in the CORE Organic AGTEC-Org project in order to give some elements on technological treatments and analyses which will be led in the project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Carcea, Marina; Samson, Marie-Françoise and Abecassis, Joël (2008) AGTEC-Org Technological Handbook of Methods. Working paper, INRAN and INRA, Roma and Montpellier . [Completed]
